summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred for a shipment, including transportation and special handling fees, and provides payment instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

persons.name: Cecilia Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Cecilia Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the recipient of a shipment, suggesting a connection to Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Cecilia Jeffrey Epstein is listed as a recipient for a shipment sent to Jeffrey Epstein's address, indicating a familial or close relationship.

events.title: Shipment Pickup
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx from Jeffrey Epstein's address.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843

keyFacts: The invoice is dated March 14, 2005, and is for a total of $32.84.
The shipment was picked up on March 4, 2005.
Cecilia Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as a recipient for a shipment.
The invoice includes a discount of $0.95 applied to the total charges.
The document provides payment instructions and a due date of March 29, 2005.
